column5: Anyone mind PMing me about Guelph lake? Was thinking if fishing it next week as I am in Cambridge. Wanna fish smallies mostly. Was wondering if it's worth the trip. Gonna fish from my boat using electic troll motor. Thanks Landry
There are some big bass in the lake, just dont expect a 20 fish day.  Focus on the submerged wood near the river inlet.  Tubes and spinnerbaits.
There are some big bass in the lake, just dont expect a 20 fish day. Focus on the submerged wood near the river inlet. Tubes and spinnerbaits. Yup, some good largies as well.
